name: wow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 used to show surprise and sometimes pleasure: Wow! Did you make that cake? It looks delicious!
More examplesFewer examples"Wow!" exclaimed John, "what a fantastic house."Wow! I wasn't expecting such a great reception.Wow! What a hat.A hundred pounds! Wow!"Wow!" said Alan excitedly.

a person or thing that is very successful, attractive, or pleasant: He's a real wow with the girls in his class.

to make someone feel great excitement or admiration: The movie wowed audiences with its amazing special effects.
